metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8308 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
LXDM before 0.5.2 did not start X server with -auth, which allows local users to bypass authentication with X connections.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lxdm - 0.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lxdm package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5.3-1').
